meanings.definition: Having a distorted or misshapen appearance.
meanings.sent1: The deformed toy had a crooked arm.
meanings.sent2: The deformed tree looked different from the others.
meanings.sent3: The deformed cake made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her deformed shadow stretched across the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The deformed cloud resembled a strange creature in the sky.

meanings.definition: To spoil the natural form or shape of; to mar.
meanings.sent1: Please don't deformed the clay sculpture while it dries.
meanings.sent2: The accident deformed the car beyond repair.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tried to deformed the garden flowers.
meanings.sent4: His harsh words deformed their friendship irreparably.
meanings.sent5: The storm's strong winds deformed the fragile umbrella.
